title: EigenLayer’s Sreeram Kannan on the Hot (and Risky) Ethereum Trend of ‘Restaking’
description: In an exclusive interview, Sreeram Kannan, the founder of EigenLayer and a pioneer behind restaking, discusses his project's goals as a new landscape for restaking emerges.

title: Biggest Movers: BCH, LINK Move to 6-Week Highs on Wednesday
description: Bitcoin cash was once again a big mover, as the cryptocurrency rose by nearly 10% during today’s session. The move saw price climb to its highest level since mid-August, and came as U.S. dollar strength pushed the S&P 500 to a three-month low. Chainlink also rallied strongly on Wednesday. title: AI’s Game-Changing Influence on the Future of Sports

title: 3% of blockchain employees get paid in crypto
description: About 88% of employees in the blockchain industry work remotely, but only 3% are paid in digital assets

title: Curve founder repays Aave loan, still owes $42m to defi lenders
description: Michael Egorov, the co-founder of Curve Finance, has completely settled his debt on Aave by depositing 68 million CRV

title: Chainlink to Connect Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, IOTA, and Other Industry Giants with SWIFT and the Trillion-Dollar Payments Market

title: Cloud Mining Made Easy with TopHash Hashpower Marketplace
description: Crypto mining is no longer profitable for several reasons, according to crypto enthusiasts. title: Bitcoin Spot ETF, Halving, and US Treasuries: What Is Driving BTC Price to a New All-Time High of $150,000? A Deep Dive
description: Data has suggested there’s an interesting relationship between U.S. 10-year Treasurys and Bitcoin halving price rallies.
